turkish: Bu ev Ali'nin kardeşine ait. (to belong)
english: This house belongs to Ali's brother.
The door of the office was repaired.
The pages of the book are torn.
The pen on the table belongs to Ayşe.
The keys of the car are on the table.

turkish: Bu defter Ayşe'nin kardeşine ait. (to belong)
english: This notebook belongs to Ayşe's sister.

turkish: Şirketin yeni projesi çok önemli. (to be)
english: The company's new project is very important.

turkish: Toplantının sonucu herkes için kritikti. (to be)
english: The result of the meeting was critical for everyone.
Ali's bike is in the garage.
The garden of the school is very large.

turkish: Bu evin pencereleri çok büyük. (to be)
english: The windows of this house are very big.

turkish: Bu kitabın yazarını tanıyor musun? (to know)
english: Do you know the author of this book?
The ending of the movie was very impressive.
The view from here is truly mesmerizing.
The key of the office is with Ali.

turkish: Bu dersin konuları çok zor. (to be)
english: The topics of this lesson are very difficult.
